item.title: Have your Debian cake and eat it too
item.description: I recently switched to Debian because I wanted a rock solid plain Gnome environment for my daily driver / work laptop. The main downside is that even Debian testing is a bit more conservative with updates than I would like for certain applications. Normally I would use and recommend Flatpak, but there are a few edge cases where I need to use the Debian package, which leads me to today’s post.
